message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"wrong; incorrect","sentence":"这不对，是错。","image_prompt":"A softly animated apocalyptic scene, showing a girl in a simple room, looking at a written answer on a piece of paper with a big red X (cross) marked above it. The appearance suggests something has gone wrong (incorrect) in a school setting. Use soft lighting and pastel colors, include subtle visual hints of gentle decay or disarray outside the window, matching a soft apocalypse animation style.","sentence_translation":"This is not right, it is wrong."}
